data.comment: Michal Helik (Barnsley) has received a yellow card from James Linington.
In the minute 18, Barnsley's Michal Helik has been booked in London.
Alex Mowatt puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Jake Cooper equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
The second-half is underway in London.
At The Den, Callum Brittain has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 58, Herbie Kane is replacing Elliot Simoes for the away team.
Gary Rowett (Millwall) is making a first substitution, with Kenneth Zohore replacing Connor Mahoney.
Luke Thomas is on a sub for Matty James for Barnsley.
In the minute 73, Romal Palmer is replacing Alex Mowatt for Barnsley at The Den.
The home team have replaced Shaun Williams with Ryan Woods. This is the second substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
Gary Rowett is making the team's third substitution at The Den with Ben Thompson replacing Mason Bennett.
That's full-time at The Den. The final score is 1-1.
